WorkItem.ClosedComment: If you're able to give us a small repro we'd love to see it. There were a few bugs in this area earlier in the release that have been fixed but there may still be more. Please re-open this if you continue to see the issue in an easy to reproduce way.
WorkItem.Description:
Sorry I haven't narrowed down the problem any more than this. I've uninstalled the 0.9.0 plugin and it's time consuming to re-install it. None the less, these steps should reproduce the problem.

Open a command prompt and type in the following commands 

git clone https://github.com/madmaw/iassetlab.git
cd iassetlab
git reset --hard 369a58492cec3bfbc95a6c0feb8a8f2c9a5ff305
cd iassetlab-templa
ant samples

Work around the browser security for accessing local files as described here https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/wiki/How-to-run-things-locally (or just use IE and click the "allow active x access" popup)

Access iassetlab/iassetlab-templa/index.html in your favorite browser

There will be a script error that fairly obviously traces back to a missing _this variable.

Comments.Message: Do you still see this with a more recent compiler?  You can try it out pretty easily using the tsc that's available in /bin of our current release-0.9.0 branch.

Argh! The repository kicked me off just before I got to 100%. I'm on a reasonably expensive mobile broadband connection (yes, this is ameteur hour :/) so I can't keep attempting to clone the 400MB+ repo. I'll wait until the next alpha release. 

Thanks for trying!
